## ThemeOptions.forceCapability property

Force specific capability levels (for testing)

**Signature:**

```typescript
forceCapability?: {
        color?: 'none' | 'ansi16' | 'ansi256' | 'truecolor';
        theme?: 'blind' | 'lightdark' | 'palette';
    };
```
